article_metadata.description: RUSSIA HAS responded to new sanctions from the U.S. and the EU with a weird, self-defeating retaliatory measure: It is banning for a year a variety of food imports from the offending parties, among them salmon from Norway, apples from Poland, cheeses from Denmark and the Netherlands, pears from Belgium [...]
article_metadata.author: Steve Forbes
